name: Diner Dynamo
description:
How to play: (This is a 2 player game. Controllers are required!) Use the left control stick to move your pilot chef and use the appropriate face buttons at the cooking stations to feed your robots hamburgers.

Feeding your robots increases your spirit and your score. Use spirit to launch rockets and giant robot punches at the opposing player!

Winner is declared with the highest score after two minutes of play.
